title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. U, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 6000 - Medical And Physical Fitness Standards And Procedures For Police Officer Candidates
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. U, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 6000

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§ 837[13], 840; 42 U.S.C. 12101
et
seq. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
